abstract: Yemeni Pres Abdu Rabbu Mansour Hadi holds first public meeting with state officials since he fled house arrest by Houthi militia.
lead_paragraph: President Abdu Rabbu Mansour Hadi on Sunday held his first public meeting with state officials since he fled house arrest by the Houthi militia.

headline.main: Yemeni President Is Taking Steps to Resume Duties
headline.print_headline: Yemeni President Is Taking Steps to Resume Duties

snippet: President Abdu Rabbu Mansour Hadi on Sunday held his first public meeting with state officials since he fled house arrest by the Houthi militia.
